programme.desc: Tá Ríona leis an lá a chaitheamh ag seisiún gleacaíochta. (Ríona is going to spend the day learning gymnastics.)

programme.title: Béiríní is a Leabhair
programme.desc: Foghlaimíonn Bromaire le meas a bheith aige ar ghnáthóg na buaife. (Bromaire learns to respect his new toad friend's habitat.)

programme.title: Nuair a Bheidh Mé Mór
programme.desc: Samhlaíonn Isabelle a saol ina múinteoir damhsa nuair a bheidh sí mór. (Isabelle imagines her life as a dancing teacher when she grows up.)

programme.title: Dinosaur Train
programme.desc: Is cosúil nach bhfuil mórán laghairteanna fanta ar Oileán na Laghairteanna. (The Pteranodons discover that there are few lizards left on Lizard Island.)

programme.title: Kid E Cats
programme.desc: Téann Daidí agus na piscíní ar strae i lúbra. (Daddy and the kittens get lost in a labyrinth.)

programme.title: Blocuimhreacha
programme.desc: Téann Aon ag tóraíocht taisce agus aimsíonn sí táblaí a haon. (One goes in search of treasure today and as a result she comes across one times table.)

programme.title: Naíonáin an Zú
programme.desc: Sraith faoin saol mar atá sé ag ainmhithe nuabheirthe in dhá zú i mBeirlín na Gearmáine. (This series discovers what it takes to be a baby in a modern zoo.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Tá náire ar Kevin go bhfuil a mháthair ag obair sa scoil. (Kevin is too embarrassed for words when his mother takes a job at school.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Ní maith le Blanche ná le Rose cara Dorothy, an scríbhneoir postúil Barbara Thorndyke. (Blanche and Rose despise Dorothy's pompous friend, novelist Barbara Thorndyke.)

programme.title: A Chef's Life
programme.desc: Tá bialann Vivian ar an bhfód le deich mbliana agus beidh ócáid speisialta ar siúl sa bhialann chun é sin a cheiliúradh. (Chef and the Farmer turns 10 years old.)

programme.title: Paisean Faisean
programme.desc: Clár cleamhnais a thugann dúshlán do thriúr fear óg culaith a cheannach do chailín. Sna Clocha Liatha a bheifear ar an gclár seo. (This dating show brings us to Greystones.)

programme.title: Dr Quinn Medicine Woman
programme.desc: Tá imní ar an Dr Mike faoi Brian atá maraithe ag iarraidh meaisín eitilte a thógáil. (Dr. Mike is worried about Brian who is consumed with his efforts to build a flying machine.)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Tá bealach aimsithe ag bean chun geir a dhiúscairt gan dochar a dhéanamh don timpeallacht. (A single mom believes her eco-friendly grease disposal method will be enough.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Miraculous
programme.desc: Is í máthair Juleka an Captaen Cruachloch anois. (Juleka's mother gets akumatized into Captain Hardrock and wants to blast her music across Paris.)

programme.title: Garfield
programme.desc: Fuadaíonn iolar mór Odie. (A big huge eagle comes along and takes Odie way up above the cliffs!)

programme.title: Dónall Dána
programme.desc: Tá imní ar Eithne agus ar Ghearóid go bhfuil Cáitín Cur Amach amú. (Polly and Paul are in a panic when Vomiting Vera goes missing at her own christening.)

programme.title: Dónall Dána
programme.desc: Nuair a fhaigheann Dónall amach go bhfuil luach mór ar stampaí áirithe tosaíonn sé ag lorg ceann ar fiú na milliúin é. (Henry searches for a stamp worth millions.)

programme.title: Taffy
programme.desc: Dúisíonn Taffy arís agus arís eile an lá céanna. (Taffy wakes up to a beautiful day, and then he wakes up again, and again - on the same day.)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Téann Angelo chuig rang ióga. (Angelo goes to a yoga class.)

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom
programme.desc: Caithfidh Bricín fáil réidh lena sheanteidí mar go bhfuil gach duine ag magadh faoi. (Buttsquat gets rid of his teddy bear because everyone is making fun of him.)

programme.title: Spongebob Squarepants
programme.desc: Cuirtear an Krusty Krab ar coraintín, ach níl a fhios cé air atá an galar neamhghnách. (The Krusty Krab goes under quarantine, but no one knows who carries the mysterious illness.)

programme.title: Timpeall Orainn
programme.desc: Is ag cabhrú leis na beacha a bheifear ar chlár an lae inniu. (Today we will help the world around us by learning how we can help the bees.)

programme.title: Siar Linn
programme.desc: Seó cluichí ina gcuirfear eolas ar ré ar leith sa stair trí chluichí éagsúla a imirt. (A game show where we explore a different era of history in each episode.)
